title: A deuoute treatise vpon the Pater noster, made fyrst in latyn by the moost famous doctour mayster Erasmus Roterodamus, and tourned in to englisshe by a yong vertuous and well lerned gentylwoman of. xix. yere of age
author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
publisher: In fletestrete, in the house of Thomas Berthelet nere to the Cundite, at the signe of Lucrece,
